get.description:
查看指定卡牌的某些信息（除了合成所需材料）

:param card_id: 要查看的卡牌id

:return: 卡牌信息

schema.title: Response Query Card Info Endpoint Card Info Get

get.description:
查看指定卡牌的合成所需材料

:param card_id:

:return: 合成所需材料

schema.title: Response Query Card Compose Materials Endpoint Card Materials Compose Get

get.description:
查看指定卡牌的分解所能获得材料

:param card_id:

:return: 合成所需材料

schema.title: Response Query Card Decompose Materials Endpoint Card Materials Decompose Get

get.description:
查看在售卡牌，包名即商店分区，可选名称或价格作为查询参数。

:param user_id: 用户id
:param package: 卡牌所属扩招包名称
:param name_in: 卡牌名称中包含的字符串（模糊查询）
:param price_le: 价格小于等于此值
:param price_ge: 价格大于等于此值

:return: 符合条件的在售卡牌

schema.title: Response Query Card Store Cards Get

post.description:
在商店中上架卡牌

:param card_to_list: 待购买的卡牌对象
:param user_id: 卖家id，通过依赖获取

schema.title: Response List Card Store Cards Post

put.description:
购买商店中的卡牌

:param card_to_buy: 待购买的卡牌对象
:param user_id: 买家id，通过依赖获取
:param except_slippage: 用户可接受的滑点

:return: 购买成功返回花费的比特

schema.title: Response Buy Card Store Cards Put

delete.description:
下架商店中的卡牌

:param card_to_delist: 待下架的卡牌对象
:param user_id: 用户id，通过依赖获取

:return: 成功下架的卡牌数量；下架请求处理过程中已经被他人购买的卡牌数量

schema.title: Response Delist Card Store Cards Delete

get.description:
查看指定uid的玩家商店中在售卡牌，目标玩家和当前用户必须是好友

:param store_user_uid: 目标商店玩家uid
:param user_id: 当前用户id

:return:

schema.title: Response Query Friends Card Store  Store User Uid  Cards Get

put.description:
购买指定uid的玩家商店中指定在售卡牌，目标玩家和当前用户必须是好友

:param store_user_uid: 目标商店玩家uid
:param card_to_buy: 目标购买的卡牌
:param user_id: 当前用户id

:return: 购买成功返回花费的比特

schema.title: Response Buy Friends Card Store  Store User Id  Cards Put
Response Get Waiting Accept Player Friendship Under Review Get

post.description:
向指定 uid 玩家发起好友请求

:param request_user_uid: 目标玩家 uid
:param request_message: 请求时附带的消息
:param user_id: 当前玩家 id, Depends自动获取

:return: 请求响应结果

schema.title: Response Request Friendship Player Friendship  Request User Uid  Post

put.description:
处理一个收到的好友请求

:param request_user_uid: 请求者 uid
:param is_accepted: 是否同意
:param user_id: 当前玩家 id, 通过Depends自动获取

:return: 请求响应结果

schema.title: Response Handle Friend Request Player Friendship  Request User Uid  Put

delete.description:
删除好友

:param friend_uid: 目标删除的好友 uid
:param user_id: 当前用户 id

:return:

schema.title: Response Delete Friendship Player Friendship  Friend Uid  Delete

get.description:
查看自己拥有的卡牌

:param name_in: 卡牌名称（模糊查询）
:param rarity: 卡牌稀有度
:param package: 卡牌包
:param user_id: 用户id

:return: 查询到的持有卡牌

schema.title: Response Query Box Player Cards Get

post.description:
抽卡请求接口

:return: 抽到的卡牌

schema.title: Response Pull Card Player Cards Post

put.description:
合卡请求接口

:param card_to_compose: 目标合成的卡牌
:param user_id: 玩家id

:return: 合成结果

schema.title: Response Compose Card Player Cards Put

delete.description:
分卡请求接口

:param card_to_decompose: 目标分解的卡牌
:param user_id: 玩家id

:return: 分解结果

schema.title: Response Decompose Card Player Cards Delete

get.description:
获取今日未完成的订单

:param user_id: 用户id

:return: 今日未完成的订单

schema.title: Response Get Waiting Orders Player Orders Waiting Get

get.description:
获取今日新订单（发起这个请求时订单才被创建）

:param user_id: 用户id

:return: 新的订单

schema.title: Response Get New Orders Player Orders New Get

post.description:
提交物品并完成指定的订单

:param order_id: 订单 id
:param user_id: 用户 id

:return: 订单收益

schema.title: Response Complete Order Player Orders  Order Id  Post

delete.description:
用户主动删除一个订单

:param order_id: 订单id
:param user_id: 用户id

:return: 删除结果

schema.title: Response Delete Order Player Orders  Order Id  Delete

get.description:
查找符合条件的群聊

:param group_uid: 群聊uid, 当此参数不为空时，查询到的条目将是唯一的
:param name_in: 群聊名称检索
:param level_ge: 群聊等级检索

:return: 符合条件的群聊

schema.title: Response Query Groups Not In Endpoint Groups Others Get

查看自己已加入的群聊(用于在群聊主页返回数据)
